name: Glasses James: World Fighter
description:
UPDATE:
Week 2 has now been added! Play against a Boxing/Dancing Trainer, A fat vampire, and a doctor! More is on the way. Stay tuned!

Play as James! A child who's mother is trying to get him out of her house. James is a GAMER who loves playing games such as Street Fighter, Mortal Combat, and of course Punch Out! Now, James needs money to support his mom every week. Play in several boxing weeks and try to get to the challenger.

Controls:

A/S Dodge.
O/P Punch
W Upper Punch
S Duck

Also. Click the reset every time you beat a boss to go back to the menu.
